title: ria remote testing hangs/floods
body:
Current TL;DR:
- not yet sure what "channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed" are about but probably they come from the ssh control path mux process we start in the main process.
- recent versions of git-annex lead to proliferation of external remote processes during `testremote` which is probable cause for the "out of memory" in #4640 failures on travis. [git-annex issue](https://git-annex.branchable.com/bugs/testremote_breeds_way_too_many_instances_of_the_externals_remote/?updated) filed

Original details etc:   Running it locally results in
```
(git)lena:~datalad/datalad[rf-travis-conda]git
$> DATALAD_TESTS_SSH=1 python -m nose -s -v datalad/distributed/tests/test_ria_basics.py 2>&1 | ts
Jun 19 12:14:09 datalad.distributed.tests.test_ria_basics.test_initremote_basic('datalad-test',) ... ok
Jun 19 12:14:56 datalad.distributed.tests.test_ria_basics.test_initremote_basic(None,) ... ok
Jun 19 12:15:08 datalad.distributed.tests.test_ria_basics.test_initremote_rewrite('datalad-test',) ... ok
Jun 19 12:15:18 datalad.distributed.tests.test_ria_basics.test_initremote_rewrite(None,) ... ok
Jun 19 12:15:36 datalad.distributed.tests.test_ria_basics.test_gitannex_ssh ... testremote store (generating test keys...) Remote Tests
Jun 19 12:15:36   unavailable remote
Jun 19 12:15:36     removeKey:                                       git-annex: Cannot run git-annex-remote-!dne! -- It is not installed in PATH (/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git-core:/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/bin:/usr/lib/git-annex.linux:/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/dev3/bin:/home/yoh/gocode/bin:/home/yoh/gocode/bin:/home/yoh/bin:/home/yoh/.local/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/local/games:/usr/games:/sbin:/usr/sbin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/extra)
Jun 19 12:15:36 OK
Jun 19 12:15:36     storeKey:                                          Cannot run git-annex-remote-!dne! -- It is not installed in PATH (/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git-core:/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/bin:/usr/lib/git-annex.linux:/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/dev3/bin:/home/yoh/gocode/bin:/home/yoh/gocode/bin:/home/yoh/bin:/home/yoh/.local/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/local/games:/usr/games:/sbin:/usr/sbin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/lib/git-annex.linux/extra)
Jun 19 12:15:36 OK (0.01s)
Jun 19 12:15:36     checkPresent:                                    OK
Jun 19 12:15:36     retrieveKeyFile:                                 OK
Jun 19 12:15:36     retrieveKeyFileCheap:                            OK
Jun 19 12:15:36   key size Just 1048576; remote chunksize=0 encryption=none
Jun 19 12:15:45     removeKey when not present:                      OK (8.93s)
Jun 19 12:15:54     present False:                                   OK (8.49s)
Jun 19 12:16:02     storeKey:                                        OK (8.60s)
Jun 19 12:16:11     present True:                                    OK (8.78s)
Jun 19 12:16:15     storeKey when already present:                   channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed
Jun 19 12:16:19 channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed
Jun 19 12:16:20 OK (9.39s)
Jun 19 12:16:24     present True:                                    channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed
Jun 19 12:16:28 channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed
Jun 19 12:16:29 OK (8.79s)
Jun 19 12:16:33     retrieveKeyFile:                                 channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed
Jun 19 12:16:38 channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed
Jun 19 12:16:39 OK (9.66s)
Jun 19 12:16:43     fsck downloaded object:                          channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed
...
```
and eventually leading even to more of thos
```
Jun 19 12:22:11 channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed
Jun 19 12:22:11 channel 22: open failed: connect failed: open failed
```
overall ssh works ok to localhost:
```
$> ssh -p 22 localhost hostname
lena
```
The `Cannot run git-annex-remote-!dne! ` seems benign (not sure what annex tries to do really and how it comes about) and I observed it before: https://github.com/datalad/datalad/commit/11a265c4182b08172e77889d508704a5319a5362
